content: आर्जवं [ऋजोर्भावः अण्] {@--1@} Straightness; दूरं यात्युदरं च रोमलतिका नेत्रार्जवं धावति <ls>S. D.</ls> {@--2@} Straightforwardness, rectitude of conduct, uprightness, honesty, sincerity, open-heartedness; अहिंसा क्षांतिरार्जवं <ls>Bg. 13. 7</ls>; क्षेत्रमार्जवस्य <ls>K. 45</ls>; <ls>Bh. 2. 22.</ls> {@--3@} Simplicity, humility; <ls>Ki. 4. 13</ls>; <ls>Mv. 5. 46.</ls>
